!Run out from [Kimeriana] the Fairy- townsman: Thanks!We will become your devoted friends. If you meet [Kokon] or [Ogromnyy] [Kokon] before The colonies of fairies, then you will see unhappy [Gorozhan] Of [fey] or suffering from its the deformity of [Nesovershennykh] centaurs Of [luchnikov]. Compulsorily help them!
